original: @109a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @109a rgya gar skad du /

original: a'arya ma h'a shri y'a: s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya ma h'a shri y'a: s'u tra /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo /
translated: The Sūtra of Noble Great Glory

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time,

original: bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so //
translated: the Blessed One was dwelling in Sukhāvatī.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig🔽tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived, bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One, circumambulated the Blessed One three times, and sat to one side.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das @109b kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das @109b kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Blessed One, looking at Mahāśrī, said this to Ārya Avalokiteśvara:

original: dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di /
analyzed: dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di /

original: dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am /

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /

original: dge bsnyen ma'am /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma'am /

original: de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste /

original: gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa de ni /
translated: who knows this, or who keeps it, reads it, writes it, or has it written,

original: dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro //
translated: will cast off poverty and become wealthy.

original: de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to //
translated: Then the entire assembly of spirits said, “So be it!”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste /🔽dpal ldan ma /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste / dpal ldan ma /
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke the twelve names of Śrī Mahādevī:

original: bkra shis ma /🔽padma'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: bkra shis ma / padma'i phreng ba can //

original: nor gyi bdag mo /
analyzed: nor gyi bdag mo /

original: dkar mo / grags pa chen mo /
analyzed: dkar mo / grags pa chen mo /

original: padma'i spyan / 'od chen mo /
analyzed: padma'i spyan / 'od chen mo /

original: byed pa mo /🔽zas sbyin ma /
analyzed: byed pa mo / zas sbyin ma /

original: rin po che rab tu sbyin ma /
analyzed: rin po che rab tu sbyin ma /

original: dpal chen mo /
analyzed: dpal chen mo /

original: sy'ad tha the da na /
analyzed: sy'ad tha the da na /

original: dzi ni / ghri ni /
analyzed: dzi ni / ghri ni /

original: sarba aartha s'a dha ni /
analyzed: sarba aartha s'a dha ni /

original: sha shi ni /
analyzed: sha shi ni /

original: aa lakshmi ni /
analyzed: aa lakshmi ni /

original: me n'a sha ya /
analyzed: me n'a sha ya /

original: siddhyantu me mantra pa d'a: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: siddhyantu me mantra pa d'a: sv'a h'a /

original: aom bhri ku t'i pa ra ma su bha ge sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bhri ku t'i pa ra ma su bha ge sv'a h'a /

original: lan gsum du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lan gsum du brjod par bya ste /
translated: One should recite this three times.

original: gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: For whoever recites this at the three times, all unfavorable conditions will be destroyed.

original: skal pa bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skal pa bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be endowed with good fortune.

original: 'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //

original: mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad pa byas na /
analyzed: mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad pa byas na /
translated: When going to meet someone, if one recites this and then meets with them,

original: mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par @110a *//
analyzed: mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par @110a *//
translated: that person will think of them as a child

original: 'gyur te dga' bar yang 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do //
analyzed: 'gyur te dga' bar yang 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do //
translated: and will be pleased, and will do as they are told.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na /

original: tshangs pa bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: tshangs pa bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la /
translated: even if a brahmin who is a violent person were to perform a rite, they will not be able to harm one.

original: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: One will have served many buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: The Blessed One having said this, the noble bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara rejoiced and praised what the Blessed One had taught.

original: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Sūtra of Great Glory is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Jinamitra and the chief editor-translator Bandé Yeshé Dé.
